articles.title: New Tool Predicts Changes That May Make Covid Variants More Infectious - News18
articles.description: Researchers have developed a new method that can predict with reasonable accuracy the changes in SARS-CoV-2 that may confer increased infectivity to the virus that causes COVID-19.
articles.content: Researchers have developed a new method that can predict with reasonable accuracy the changes in SARS-CoV-2 that may confer increased infectivity to the virus that causes COVID-19. The tool, describe… [+3581 chars]
